long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is for the memifacators out there. You can play popular meme songs like Thanos Theme, Mii Store Theme, Discord, Motivational Lizard, and last but not least The lion king on the click of a button. This extension is to add some fun and memes to the day. You should install it because it will help a boring day become more fun and exciting. Open extension, choose song (click the text), and enjoy.
